backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles and scam reports with permission checks using AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-generated feature evidence describing supported features, linked files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styling and custom CSS variables defining a warm OKLCH color theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app through main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theming and notification providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time users to enter a name and save their profile via mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper containing TopNav, routed page content, and a simple footer.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TopNa: Navigation bar with route links, authentication controls, profile display, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/resources/Resour: UI card with accordion sections detailing evidence to collect and safe ways to contact banks.
frontend/src/components/scam-reports/Sca: Form for submitting scam reports with fields for type, title, description, and optional loss amount.
Displays scam reports with filtering, loading states, error handling, and formatted report details.
Tabs-based filter component allowing users to select a scam type or view all reports.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes and manages the backend actor based on user identity and refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useScamReports.ts: React Query hooks for fetching all scam reports, filtering by type, and creating new reports via the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables and base global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Implements the authentication page with login/logout logic and optional profile setup prompt.
frontend/src/pages/HelpHowToHelpPage.tsx: Provides a multi‑step guide and resources for victims on what to do after being scammed.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, safety education messaging, and feature sections.
frontend/src/pages/ScamGuidancePage.tsx: Displays detailed explanations of various scam types with prevention tips.
frontend/src/pages/ScamReportsPage.tsx: Shows the community scam reports list, filtering options, and a submission form gated by authentication.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Contains formatting utilities for timestamps and monetary loss values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s current state, feature list, requirements, architecture notes, and image specifications.
